title: Hitchin Half Marathon & Tough 10 Miler
subtitle: The ultimate endurance challenge.
description: The Hitchin Half Marathon and its 10-mile counterpart take runners through the historic market town and scenic Hertfordshire countryside. This course combines challenging, rolling hills with fast, flat sections, offering a rewarding experience for both seasoned veterans and aspiring half marathoners. Expect massive local support and an incredible finish line atmosphere.

title: Hitchin 5K
subtitle: Fast and flat PB course.
description: Our 5K race is a local favourite, known for its fast, town-centre start and flat, accessible route. It's the perfect event for beginners, junior runners, or anyone looking to clock a new personal best. Enjoy the friendly, welcoming atmosphere that is second to none in the community.

title: Hitchin 10K
subtitle: Iconic countryside race.
description: The popular Hitchin 10K takes runners on a scenic loop out into the local villages of Charlton and Gosmore. It features a lively town centre start and finish and is known for the fantastic marshals and local crowds who cheer you on every step of the way.

title: Hitchin Tri
subtitle: Swim, Bike, Run challenge.
description: Our flagship multisport event, the Hitchin Tri, offers various distances to suit all abilities. The event is impeccably organized, featuring a pool swim, a clear, flat bike course, and a scenic run through the local parkland. It's a challenging yet friendly race, perfect for both first-time triathletes and seasoned competitors.
